short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publish post with delay right on your page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to publish posts to FB pages with a delay.
---Log in to the extension using Facebook, specify the pages on which you want to publish posts.
---When publishing a post, specify the date and time, click the "Publish later" button
---Open the extension popup, if your post has not been added to the popup, close and reopen
